Name: City Squid
Rules: The team has to be made having not more than 2 members
There will be filtering process as the rounds proceeds
All the teams will be provided with full size chart sheets and thermocol sheets as needed. You should bring the remaining accessories
Participants are allowed to bring colors if they are willing to make their work more precise. (NOT MANDATORY)
Any malpractice would lead to disqualification
The team should be able to present their plan to judges in a very clear tone so that they get the proper view of the plan
All students with a valid identity card from their respective educational institution and a valid DYUKSHA ID are eligible to participate in the event
Decision of organizers will be ﬁnal and binding on all
The organizers have full rights to call off the event if the required number of entries are not met, if that is the case the registered participants will be informed at the earliest
Change in rules, if any will be highlighted on the website and notiﬁed to the registered teams
